div.p: This resource is an administrative resource for using definitional resources in the scope of a catalog. This resource contains additional information about each catalog entry, in the scope of a specific catalog, such as attributes and relations to other entries.

div.div:
Boundaries and Relationships This resource is used in a Catalog which is a profile on Composition (link) and contains reference to a definitional resource, such as
Medication
Device
Activity Definition
Specimen Definition
...
The catalog....
